messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Somebody just broke into our house. They're trying to break into my bedroom.
What's your address?
3719 North East 64th Avenue.
How long ago did this happen?
About 20 seconds ago.
Is he still in the house?
I don't know. I'm pointing a gun at the door in case someone comes through it.
How did they try to get in?
I don't know. I was asleep. My dog started barking.
Okay, you said someone tried to break into your house. Through what door or window?
He's trying to break through my door.
Is he still outside now?
He's in my house trying to break into my bedroom.
Do you know who it is?
No, I don't.
Listen to me, my partner is getting officers on the way. Stay calm and stay in the room, okay?
All right.
He's trying to kick the door in. Tell him that police are on the way and he needs to leave.
Cops are on the way, you need to leave!
What type of gun are you armed with?
A .22 caliber handgun.
And you have no idea who it is, correct?
I've never seen this guy before in my life.
He's on my bedroom floor bleeding.
Okay, we are sending an ambulance. Is he inside your bedroom now?
Yes, right here.
Did you shoot him?
I did. He charged at me and my wife.
Where did you shoot him?
In the body.
We're getting medical help started as well. Is he still conscious?
I don't know. I'm not going near him.
Is your front door unlocked?
I don't know.
Can you have your wife go unlock the front door?
She's going now.
After the front door is unlocked, secure the dog.
My wife is locking up the dog now.
Where did you secure the weapon?
It's in the kitchen, and he's in my bedroom.
Okay, unload your gun.
It's unloaded, the chamber is empty.
Leave the gun on the kitchen table and go outside with your wife.
Alright, we're going outside.
Do you see my officers?
Yes, but they're down the block.
Stop walking and stand at your front door. Wait for the officers to give you instructions.
Alright, we're waiting.
Is your wife still with you?
Yes, she just walked out.
Both of you just stay there and wait for the officers.
Okay, we're in our driveway now.
Were there any other guns in the bedroom that he could access?
No, there aren't.
Put the gun on the ground and follow the officer's commands.
Okay, doing that now.
Goodbye.
